DOC.brief_summary: Effect N-methyl D-aspartate ( NMDA ) receptor antagonist Dextromethorphan Opiods analgesia tolerance Pediatric Intensive Care Unit Patients
DOC.brief_title: Effect N-methyl D-aspartate ( NMDA ) Receptor Antagonist Dextromethorphan Opiods Analgesia Tolerance Pediatric Intensive Care Unit Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Patients 2 year , admit PICU On Morphine Fentanyl infusion 48 hour Patients 2 year age Patients anticipated PICU length stay le 3 day . Patients shall exclude Morphine Fentanyl infusion continue minimum duration 72 hour enrollment Patients develop hemodynamic instability Patients Hepatic failure Withdrawal request parent ( ) /guardian/family
